text:
"You dont really want a wow 2. You only think you do" 

It'll happen as soon as the IP well runs dry and the cash shop stops drawing interest.

That said: wows stylized graphics are what lead to quick turn outside for expansions and a broader audience. Its doubtful you'll see much of a change.

It has a negative impact on wild life. It lowers the population and maybe they dont want people fishing to increase the strain on the eco-system.

The meat of the fish is more than likely safe. The toxin could be fully processed by the fish before reaching anything edible.
